ComicInfo.Summary:
Seed of Destruction [Chapter Four]: Liz's energy is drained by Rasputin to channel through Sadu-Hem and free the Ogdru-Jahad as Hellboy battles the frog creature's numbing hold. An untold distance away, the assault on the Seven Beasts' tombs is being incredulously monitored by an alien race. While Abe, spurred on by the spirit of Elihu Cavendish, mortally wounds Rasputin and Liz's power proves too much for him to contain, it falls to Hellboy to face the wizard in final battle.
Who Are Monkeyman and O'Brien? [Chapter] 4: Axwell works feverishly to repair the interdimensional transporter in William O'Brien's lab with the help of Ann, still growing stronger and more energetic. Just as their work is completed, the streets of South San Francisco are breached by The Shrewmanoid.
